title: [Bug] Randomly getting posts and  comments snipped
body:
Keep getting snipped, ~~explained via attachments.~~ Can't attach, explained via embeds.

What's being retained:
http://i.imgur.com/RrJ1IZU.jpg

What's being submitted:
http://i.imgur.com/xyOI3sz.jpg

replies.body:
Hey there, 

Sorry about this, it is our security filter to prevent XSS being a bit overzealous. Any time you put a less-than symbol with text immediately after it, it will get snipped. We will fix this, to be a lot smarter, but in the mean time you should do this:

**Bad:** <30

**Good:** < 30

Or you can write &lt; in your posts instead of <, but that is a bit much to ask.
holy crap how did I not notice it was all after the less than symbol! Thank you Alice, I will keep that in mind. ^_^
Doesn't markdown have XSS filter integrated in itself?

A Markdown parser might (ours did not by default), but we are still storing whatever players send to us. We want to try to prevent XSS at post creation/editing time, to ensure we are not storing malicious stuff whenever possible.
There are libraries for cleaning code of malicious HTML. By default, markdown allows some HTML, such as <b> which is harmless and useful. Regular expressions aren't a good solution :P

Please try to explain more how it happens. I'm not Rioter and I can't get it fixed, but as board developpers do not fix things very often, I've developped some skill in making hacks and workarounds.

Specifically, this is what I need:

1. How and when does it occur? When typping? What does mean 'retained' and 'submitted' in your post?
2. Does it happen when replying, posting thread or editing?

Also, some general system information could be eventually helpful:

1. What browser are you using and on what system? Is there anything interesting about your environment?
2. Are there any userscripts/userstyles affecting how the page is running?
3. Do you have performance problens on the site?
4. Are there any errors in your console? (Ctrl+Shift+i)

>How and when does it occur? When typping? What does mean 'retained' and 'submitted' in your post?

Simply type everything out, submit and it posts only the first 60 or so words. When I go back to edit pic 1 shows up.

>Does it happen when replying, posting thread or editing?

All of the above.

>What browser are you using and on what system? Is there anything interesting about your environment?

Chrome, latest update. On campus, so heavy traffic on wireless.

>Are there any userscripts/userstyles affecting how the page is running?

FEK 3.0 (Tampermonkey included), Stylish, Adblock, QR Code translator, Avast

>Do you have performance problens on the site?

None moreso than usual

>Are there any errors in your console? (Ctrl+Shift+i)

None that I have seen
Seems to be unique to you. I've been fine on long posts. Try clearing cookies/cache, using a different browser?

~~Seems to be fine now. Black magic is afoot. Or random variables within the millions of factors between connections, servers, local and cloud software, packets and traffic. But I'm just going to say black magic.~~ Nope, nope, it's back. God damnit
